rules_text: Whenever Inspiring Warsworn attacks, mill three cards. For each creature card milled this way, put a +1/+1 counter on Inspiring Warsworn. For each land card milled this way, you gain 1 life. For each noncreature, nonland card, Inspiring Warsworn deals 1 damage to each opponent.
notes:
Tricolor Rare Cycle
red green white
